page.title: 09EDUCATION (4_18) _ BORTH
page.content: The present Primary School opened in 1968 has 3 classrooms, a multi_ purpose hall and a kitchen. There are 60_70 children(4_11 years) divided in _to 3 classes taken by the headteacher and two assistant teachers.Extra help is provided by peripatetic music teachers on violin and brass instruments, the remedial teacher and the 'athrawes fro' who helpd the school implement its bilingual policy. The children take part in football and hockey matches, local sports events and swimming galas. There is a Y.O.C. and an Urdd Adran. Dolybont is in the catchment area of Rhydypennau Primary, Bow Street. Alternatively, primary children can attend the Welsh medium, Ysgol Gymraeg or Convent Primary School,Aberystwyth. At 11,they transfer to Penweddig or Penglais Comprehensives, Aberystwyth.
